name: Roboctletes
storyline:
In the distant future, after the robotic industrial bubble had burst, robobuilder factories lay abandoned
People started to utilise these factories to build robots to compete with one another.
As popularity grew, fame and fortune became available to the best robots and their creators.
Do you have what it takes to build the ultimate Roboctlete?
summary: A futuristic robot track and field game for playdate.
